Module schiffeversenken
Package de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.uicomponents

Class Button

java.lang.Object
de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.uicomponents.Component
de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.uicomponents.Button
All Implemented Interfaces:
Clickable, Drawable
public abstract class Button extends Component implements Drawable, Clickable
This class represents a drawable and clickable button.
Author:
leondietrich

  • Method Details

    • checkedIfClicked

      public boolean checkedIfClicked(Vec2 clickPosition)
      Description copied from interface: Clickable
      This method gets called in order to check if the object on screen was clicked on. Do not perform any actions within this method as it may cause interference.
      Specified by:
      checkedIfClicked in interface Clickable
      Parameters:
      clickPosition - The position on the canvas where the user clicked at.
      Returns:
      true if you think that the user meant this object.

    • draw

      public void draw(Canvas c, Vec2 mouseLocation)
      Description copied from interface: Drawable
      Implement this method in order to draw your component.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface Drawable
      Parameters:
      c - The Canvas to draw on.
      mouseLocation - the location of the mouse relative to the canvas

    • getText

      public final String getText()
      Use this method in order to get the displayed Text.
      Returns:
      the text of the button

    • setText

      public final void setText(String text)
      Use this method in order to set a new display text. Keep in mind that a very long text may be longer than the button itself.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to set
